articles.title: U.S.-led International Pressure Can Never Work on DPRK: Foreign Ministry Spokesman
articles.content:
U.S.-led International Pressure Can Never Work on DPRK: Foreign Ministry Spokesman
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Tuesday as regards the fact that the U.S. is working hard to stoke the international atmosphere for pressurizing the DPRK:
					 Recently, the U.S. is seeking to gain public support at home and abroad for a newly worked out policy called "maximum pressure and engagement" in a bid to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 U.S. President Trump personally invited the delegates of the member states of the UN Security Council to the White House to discuss the issue of the DPRK. A closed-door briefing on the new policy toward the DPRK will be reportedly held in the White House for the senators in the presence of high-ranking officials including the State and Defense secretaries. Against this backdrop, the U.S. secretary of State is going to sponsor a ministerial meeting concerning the denuclearization of the DPRK at the UN Security Council.
					
					 This is just a risky act little short of lighting the fuse of a total war under the present touch-and-go situation on the Korean peninsula as they openly cried out for ratcheting up pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 The policy pursued by the U.S. to isolate and stifle the DPRK and the nuclear threat posed by the U.S. to the DPRK for more than half a century are the root cause of pushing the DPRK to have access to nukes.
					
					 The Trump administration has gone so ridiculous and foolhardy to devise the policy characterized by the "maximum pressure and engagement" without any elementary sense about the reality, far from recognizing the changed strategic position of the DPRK and the thousand-fold retaliatory will of its service personnel and people.
					
					 As the U.S. has unsheathed a dagger to stifle the DPRK at any cost, the DPRK will stand against it with a sword of justice and cut the windpipe of the U.S. imperialists by dint of the strong revolutionary forces with the nuclear force, an almighty treasured sword, as their pivot.
					
					 The present reality helps the DPRK keenly realize once again that it was entirely just when it opted for bolstering the nuclear force both in quality and quantity under the uplifted banner of the great line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 There is a saying that those who are fond of playing with fire are destined to perish in the flames. The same can be said of the U.S.

articles.title: We Will Wipe out Aggressors: Spokesman for Agricultural Workers' Union of Korea
articles.content:
We Will Wipe out Aggressors: Spokesman for Agricultural Workers' Union of Korea
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea released a statement on Tuesday to evince their will to wipe out the aggressors to the last one.
					 Terming the reckless military maneuvers and sanctions racket of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces a military provocation to seriously harass peace on the Korean peninsula and in the region and extremely strain the situation and an open declaration to ignite a nuclear war on this land at any cost, the statement said:
					
					 It is the will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to stage a death-defying resistance to wipe out the aggressors and provocateurs by reacting to their total war with an all-out war and their nuclear war with Korean-style nuclear strikes of annihilation. It is also their resolution to surely win a victory.
					
					 Once an order is issued, the agricultural workers of the DPRK will tightly hold the arms for annihilating the enemy and make a clean sweep of the warlike U.S. imperialist and the south Korean puppet forces to throw them into an abyss of ruin.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers should not run riot, being mindful that their foolhardy intrusion into this land being devotedly guarded by the agricultural workers of the DPRK together with the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army with the arms of Songun will lead them to the final doom.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK are paying high tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, who founded and built the revolutionary armed forces and represent the eternal victory of the great Paektusan nation, on the occasion of the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Seen before the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the Party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, enterprises and schools at all levels in Pyongyang, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 Floral tribute was paid to the great leaders before their statues at Kim Il Sung Military University, Kim Il Sung University of Politics, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other places in Pyongyang.
					
					 Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children across the country laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of the great leaders in their units and residential quarters.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions in Different Countries
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were sent to missions of the DPRK in Russia, Laos, Algeria, Cambodia and Hong Kong of China from April 4 to 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The floral baskets were from the State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia, the Laos-Korea Friendship Association, the Lao Federation of Trade Unions, the defense minister of Laos who is a member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, and members of the C.C., LPRP, the general secretary of the Algerian National Liberation Front Party and a Cambodian family.
					
					 The floral baskets were laid before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the picture of the great leaders in the missions of the DPRK.
					
					 Meanwhile, the co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, sent a floral basket to the DPRK mission in Hong Kong of China on April 13.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Revolutionary, Patriotic Martyrs Cemeteries
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Revolutionary, Patriotic Martyrs Cemeteries
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Tuesday, the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Seen on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths sent by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior Party and state leading officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the Party, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and observed a moment's silence in memory of her.
					
					 Laid on the wreath-laying stands of the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri  were the wreaths in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK and on the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" of the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery a wreath in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 Also laid there were wreaths in the names of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions of science, education, literature and arts, public health and the press, and party and power bodies, farms, etc. in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs and went round the cemeteries.
					
					 Meanwhile, wreaths were also laid before the statues of martyrs, martyrs cemeteries, memorial towers for the fallen soldiers of the KPA and martyrs graves across the country on the same day.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Senior Party and state officials visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday, the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 They included Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior Party and state leading officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang and officials of the Party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Laid before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Also laid there were floral baskets in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and in the joint name of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants laid high tribute to the statues of the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 They made bows to the great leaders who lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 Service personnel and working people of all social standings visited the palace and paid high tribute to the great leaders on the same day.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Martyrs Cemeteries
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Martyrs Cemeteries
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here laid wreaths before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Tuesday, the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The members of the corps laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and observed a moment's silence in memory of her.
					
					 A wreath in the name of the corps was placed on the wreath-laying stand of the cemetery.
					
					 The members of the corps observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs.
					
					 They also laid a wreath on the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" of the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.
					
					 They paid tribute to the martyrs of the KPA.

articles.title: People's Delegations Visit KPA Units
articles.content:
People's Delegations Visit KPA Units
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- People's delegations visited units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on the occasion of the 85th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 Service personnel of the KPA and their families greeted members of the delegations.
					
					 Gifts sent by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were conveyed to service personnel.
					
					 Members of the people's delegations told the service personnel about the people in their drive for all-people charge to attain the goals of the five-year strategy for national economy development and handed aid materials to the service personnel.
					
					 They took part in colorful political and cultural events to celebrate the 85th founding anniversary of the KPA together with service personnel.
					
					 Spending the army founding day with service personnel, the members of the delegations requested them to perform feats in the struggle for defending the country.
					
					 All the service personnel renewed their pledge to devotedly defend the land, seas and sky of the country and become the first life-guardsmen, the first death-defying corps of the Workers' Party of Korea, bearing in mind the request of the people.

articles.title: Performance Given by Youth League Art Squad to Mark Founding Anniversary of KPA
articles.content:
Performance Given by Youth League Art Squad to Mark Founding Anniversary of KPA
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League at the plaza of the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Tuesday, the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", male chorus "The Guerilla March", brass quartet "To a Decisive Battle" and male quartet "Song of Pride of Guards Units."
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the army-building exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The audience was mesmerized by female quintet "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un" and male solo "We Call Him Our Father" which reflected the personality of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as a great man.
					
					 Female solo "Korea, Forward with Line of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts" represented the faith of the young vanguard to create the new legendary tales about heroic youth at the worksites for building a powerful nation, holding fast to the Party's new line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in different parts of the country to celebrate the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Dancing parties began amid the playing of song "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Arch of Triumph and other dancing party grounds.
					
					 The participants presented seas of dance in humble reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who strengthened the KPA into the matchless revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					 Overflowing at the dancing party grounds were the glory and pride of the youth and students who are glorifying the history and tradition of victory, holding respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as the supreme commander of the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 Dancing parties took place at the provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Concert Given by KPA Song and Dance Ensemble
articles.content:
Concert Given by KPA Song and Dance Ensemble
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) --A music and dance performance was given by the Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble at the April 25 House of Culture on Tuesday, the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior Party and state leading officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the Party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions, industrial establishments and persons of merit in Pyongyang, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys here and their spouses and military attaches of foreign embassies here and their spouses and other foreign guests.
					
					 The performance began with revolutionary hymn "Ode to General Kim Jong Un" and "Song of the Korean People's Army" in chorus. Put on the stage were chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", orchestra and chorus "Song of the Revolutionary Army" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by giving the origin to the building of the Juche-based army and strengthening the KPA into the invincible revolutionary army.
					
					 They eulogized pride and self-esteem of the service personnel of the KPA who are ushering in the greatest heyday of the cause of army-building of Juche, closely united around respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers reflecting the revolutionary and optimistic life of the service personnel and showing the will of strong a-match-for-a-hundred army to put an end to the history of the confrontation with the U.S. which has lasted century after century and achieve the reunification of the country.

articles.title: Delegation of Officials of Chongryon Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Officials of Chongryon Leaves
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) led by Song Tong Hwi, vice-department director of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, left here on Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK, Nuclear Power in East
articles.content:
DPRK, Nuclear Power in East
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- It has been 85 years since President Kim Il Sung founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA), the first revolutionary armed forces of Juche type, on April 25, Juche 21 (1932). With the foundation of the KPRA, Korea, which was subjected to a miserable fate as a weak colony due to its feeble military power, came to have its genuine army.
					 Under the guidance of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the Korean people defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in the 20th century and the DPRK developed into a military giant with powerful self-reliant capabilities.
					
					 In this world where the global peace and security are jeopardized due to the moves of the U.S. and its followers, the DPRK displays its might as a nuclear power in the East under the Songun (military-first) leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK took a strategically important position with its successes in the test of first H-bomb, nuclear warhead explosion test, test-launch of surface-to-surface medium long-range ballistic missile Pukguksong-2 and other test-fires of various offensive means.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK, including the Korean People's Army (KPA) Strategic Force, have developed into an invincible army equipped with miniaturized and precision nuclear striking means and sophisticated strike means.
					
					 And the combat efficiency of the KPA has been remarkably enhanced through such military drills as the artillery firing contest of KPA large combined units, landing and anti-landing exercises of the KPA, a ballistic rocket launching drill of Hwasong artillery units of the KPA Strategic Force, the combat flight contest among commanding officers of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force-2016 and the KPA Tank Crews' Competition-2017.
					
					 Thanks to having the invincible military power, the DPRK is successfully pushing forward the cause of building a socialist power, frustrating the hostile forces' mad-cap nuclear war provocations.

articles.title: Do Not Mock Public Candlelight Action: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Do Not Mock Public Candlelight Action: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye, who was punished by the public, is enjoying privilege in prison. 
					 The Seoul Detention House let criminal Park stay in a jailer's room for two days as demanded by her and gave her a solitary cell twice larger than a common one.
					
					 It even provided her with an interview room and veiled its CCTV camera so that her private lawyer may be closeted with her anytime.
					
					 Providing such privilege for Park is a foolish action of dolts who serve the top-class criminal and an intolerable mockery of the public who staged candlelight action in demand of taking her to the scaffold.
					
					 The candlelight action staged in protest against the extra-large scandal ousted Park from her office as she committed evil doings against the nation, the people and humanity during her four years in office.
					
					 It is a well-known fact that she is not entitled to enjoy any privilege as former "president" except escort and guard for her personal safety.
					
					 It is the height of impudence for Park to exercise or enjoy privilege as she is a prisoner waiting for a trial and sentence for her involvement of a variety of crimes.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the south Korean conservative group, seeking a way out in protecting Park, is calling for granting a pardon to her.
					
					 Upon the disclosure of this fact, south Korean people from all walks of life are criticizing Park for failing to drop her bad habit of reigning over law and calling for forcing her to pay dearly for her crimes. They bitterly denounce the judicial authorities, getting vocal demanding to severely punish her.
					
					 Punishment by history and public mindset has not yet ended.
					
					 Although the prosecution sued her for her involvement in 18 crimes including bribery and power abuses, her 7-hour absence during the ferry Sewol sinking and other principal suspicions have not yet been made clear, and THAAD deployment, "agreement" on sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, shutdown of the Kaesong Industrial Park and other evil doings have not yet been redressed.
					
					 The reality proves that pro-Park evil-doers are still acting rashly in a bid to repeat her crime-woven history.
					
					 However, traitor Park is bound to face the heaviest punishment for her thrice-cursed crimes, as demanded by the public. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet conservative group will never be able to escape the severe punishment for reading her face and letting her enjoy privilege in prison while shielding her by playing down and covering up her obvious crimes.
					
					 Nothing can quench the will of the south Korean people to strictly punish the Park Geun Hye group going against the times and public mindset and to build a new democratic society.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Overlooking U.S. Biochemical War Plan
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Overlooking U.S. Biochemical War Plan
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities are overlooking the U.S. implementation of its plan for a biochemical war.
					 These days the U.S. forces in south Korea announced that they brought experimental equipment for Jupiter Plan, a plan for a biochemical war against the north, to the U.S. military base in Pusan Port.
					
					 The U.S. criminal scenario to turn south Korea into a testing ground for its biochemical war and bring horrible disaster to the Korean nation is sparking off the bitterest anger of all Koreans.
					
					 The Jupiter Plan pushed forward by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces is an extremely dangerous war scenario the keynote of which is to massively use biochemical weapons in the future war against the DPRK.
					
					 During the last Korean War, the U.S. imperialists indiscriminately massacred Korean people by using germ and chemical weapons although their use is banned internationally. The brutal killings and their terrible consequences are making all Koreans tremble with rage even now.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists dropped germ-bombs over 700 times on more than 400 different places from late January to late March in 1952. Owing to the brutal germ and chemical warfare, more than 50 000 people lost their lives in the northern half of Korea alone.
					
					 However, the south Korean servants of devils actively align themselves with the brigandish U.S. moves to unhesitatingly exterminate the Korean nation to realize its ambition for world domination, far from protesting it.
					
					 As made public already, there are more than 15 kinds of germs such as pest and botulinus to be used for the Jupiter Plan. In 2015 alone, the U.S. introduced active anthrax germs called "white powder of horror" 16 times into the U.S. military bases in south Korea to conduct germ weapon tests.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Park Geun Hye group of traitors shielded the criminal act of the U.S., saying that the anthrax germs introduction was a "mere mistake" and that "it is hard to term it a violation of the rules of the Status of Forces Agreement."
					
					 They even claimed "it was a self-defensive act to cope with anthrax germ attack from the north." Not content with this, they asked the U.S. to update the Jupiter Plan, stunning the public.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group can never escape the severe punishment by history as they are frantic in the moves to exterminate the nation, after leaving the country as a testing ground for the U.S. nuclear and biochemical war, being hell-bent on escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 South Koreans from all walks of life and all other Koreans should never allow the pro-U.S. conservative group's such moves.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Marks Founding Anniversary of KPA
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Marks Founding Anniversary of KPA
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday carries an editorial to mark the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 It was a historic event which heralded the founding of new-type revolutionary armed forces and a genuine army of the leader and the Party that President Kim Il Sung founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army on April 25, Juche 21 (1932), the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the Party right after the liberation of the country. Then, he developed the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into regular revolutionary armed forces without delay so as to provide a solid guarantee for defending the revolutionary cause of the Party by force of arms.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il set it as the general task for building the army to model the entire army on Kimilsungism and opened up a new history of building the Juche-based revolutionary army of the Party with his energetic leadership.
					
					 When the Korean revolution faced the sternest ordeals, he performed gigantic historic exploits by developing the KPA into elite militant ranks and leading the unprecedented struggle for defending socialism to a victory after another by pursuing the unique Songun (army-first) politics and thus putting the country on the status of a world-class military power.
					
					 Upholding the peerlessly brilliant commanders of Songun in high esteem, our People's Army has performed the distinguished feats which other classes, strata and groups in society can never do in carrying out the socialist cause of Juche since its foundation.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the KPA led by respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Minju Joson declares that final victory is in store for us as there are the army and people single-mindedly rallied close around Kim Jong Un and the invincible military might with the nuclear force as its pivot.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flays GIs for Polluting Environment in South Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flays GIs for Polluting Environment in South Korea
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- There have occurred a lot of the cases of oil leakage from the U.S. military bases in south Korea for the past 25 years.
					 The results of the survey of underground contamination in the U.S. military base in Ryongsan, Seoul made by the south Korean Ministry of Environment showed that benzene exceeded 160 times the tolerance limits.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says in a commentary Tuesday in this regard:
					
					 Findings reveal that the U.S. is regarding south Korea as its dumping ground and the one for disposing of poisonous materials only, being indifferent to the life and security of the south Korean people.
					
					 The problem of the pollution at the U.S. military base in Ryongsan is no more than a tip of iceberg.
					
					 The U.S. military bases and their surrounding areas have been contaminated with waste oil, chemical materials, heavy metals, etc.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists threw away defoliant and other poisonous materials, seriously polluting the environment in south Korea. In 1972 they did not hesitate to secretly dispose of even a nuclear warhead in south Korea.
					
					 Paddy and non-paddy fields in Phyongthaek, Kunsan and Honam of south Korea became a barren land where even a single blade of grass can not grow due to a large amount of oil and contaminated materials leaked from the U.S. military bases.
					
					 Rivers Han and Rimjin and other rivers and streams around the U.S. military bases have not long been used as drinking water and inhabitants are dying of cancer and other diseases after drinking the contaminated underground water in these areas.
					
					 What is more shocking is the fact that the U.S. is pressurizing the south Korean puppet regime into deploying THAAD in south Korea, which negatively affects the health of the people and ecological environment.
					
					 The way of preventing the pollution of environment and outbreak of a war on the Korean Peninsula and protecting the life and security of the Korean nation is to get the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea at an early date, the commentary concludes.

articles.title: Papers Slam Risky War Maneuvers of U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces
articles.content:
Papers Slam Risky War Maneuvers of U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is bringing its strategic assets to the Korean peninsula en masse under the pretext of "independent military counteraction."
					 The south Korean puppet Ministry of Defense recently made public the "2018-2022 mid-term defense plan" to be pushed forward for the five years to come from next year and announced that it would establish the army mobilization command in coming October. Against this backdrop, the south Korean puppet forces launched Max Thunder joint air combat drill involving various fighters and troops in league with the U.S. imperialist warmongers on April 14.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says:
					
					 The above-said maneuvers indicate that the puppet forces have gone beyond the red line in its war hysteria against the north. They remain unchanged in its bad habit of doing harm to the DPRK in league with outsiders.
					
					 The south Korean puppet military persists in provocative acts targeting the DPRK with the backing of the U.S. Their main purpose is to finally round off the overall preparations for igniting a war, pursuant to the scenario for a preemptive attack on the north.
					
					 The puppet regime has gone so foolish as to attempt to browbeat the DPRK with the backing of the U.S. It is just a suicidal act to challenge the matchless revolutionary Paektusan army equipped with highly miniaturized, precision and diversified nuclear strike means.
					
					 The puppet military gangsters should not forget the day when Yonphyong Island was engulfed in flames for their reckless provocation.
					
					 If they don't want to meet the final doom, they should behave with discretion, refraining from reckless risks.
					
					 Minju Joson says the puppet forces are bound to meet the miserable end with their U.S. master if they persist in war provocations to stifle the compatriots in the north by inviting the U.S. nuclear strategic assets, failing to recognize the principal enemy of the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Forces Slammed for Conspiratorial Moves to Win "Presidential Election"
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Forces Slammed for Conspiratorial Moves to Win "Presidential Election"
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Association of Koreans in China on Wednesday issued a statement calling for heightening vigilance against the moves of the conservative forces in south Korea ahead of "presidential election."
					 On the threshold of the "presidential election" to be held in south Korea on May 9, the conservative forces are resorting to base moves for patronizing the candidate from the Kukmin Party who sympathizes with their moves for confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and policy of sycophancy and treachery, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Political charlatans of the Kukmin Party are now working hard to gain an opportunity of seizing power even by winning the support from the conservative group against the demand of the south Korean people for opening up an era of progress and democracy.
					
					 The south Koreans should clearly see through the ill intention of the conservative group and the political charlatans of the Kukmin Party deceiving the people with all sorts of tricks, engrossed with the greedy for power, heighten vigilance against them and bring about new politics and new life with their own efforts by helping the progressive pro-reform candidate win the election.

articles.title: Berlin Juche Idea Study Group Formed
articles.content:
Berlin Juche Idea Study Group Formed
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Berlin Juche Idea Study Group of Germany was formed with due ceremony on April 14.
					 Present at the inaugural ceremony were personages of the German Communist Party, the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany and other Juche idea followers.
					
					 A member of the Berlin City Committee of the German Communist Party was elected chief of the Juche idea study group.
					
					 A congratulatory message to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Make Our Country Richer and More Powerful, True to the Intention of the Great Leader" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on April 11 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The work, published on Dec. 31, Juche 83 (1994), indicates the tasks and ways to build our country, our motherland, to be richer and more powerful.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th Congress of WPK Published in Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th Congress of WPK Published in Egypt
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Nath Publishing House of Egypt published in booklet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of Its Central Committee on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The report, made by him on May 6 and 7, Juche 105 (2016), comprehensively deals with the proud achievements and valuable experience made by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in the revolution and construction under the leadership of the great leaders.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways of holding fast to the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the supreme programme of the WPK, accomplishing the cause of socialism, achieving the independent reunification of the country and global independence and steadily strengthening the WPK.

articles.title: MINREX acusa a EE.UU. de acentuar el ambiente de presion anti-RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX acusa a EE.UU. de acentuar el ambiente de presion anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por la ACNC en relacion con que Estados Unidos intenta intensificar la atmosfera internacional de presion anti-RPDC, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 25 la siguiente respuesta:
					EE.UU. invento recientemente la nueva politica llamada "maxima presion e intervencion" y trama intrigas para recabar el apoyo interno y externo a ella.
					
					El mandatario norteamericano Trump llamo a la Casa Blanca a los representantes de los paises miembros del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU para debatir el problema coreano.
					
					Ademas, se efectuara en la Casa Blanca una reunion extraoficial de explicacion de la nueva politica sobre Corea para los senadores con la participacion de las figuras de alto rango, incluso los secretarios de Estado y de Defensa.
					
					Por otra parte, el secretario de Estado planea auspiciar en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU la reunion ministerial sobre la desnuclearizacion de la RPDC.
					
					Esto significa un reclamo abierto a la presion anti-RPDC siendo un acto tan peligroso igual a encender la mecha de la guerra total bajo la situacion muy tirante de ahora de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La politica de aislamiento y aplastamiento y la amenaza nuclear anti-RPDC de EE.UU., que perdura mas de medio siglo, fue la causa y el motor que nos empujo a las posesion de armas nucleares.
					
					Es muy absurda e imprudente la nueva politica que ha inventado la administracion Trump sin el elemental sentido de la realidad, en lugar de ver correctamente la cambiada posicion estrategica de la RPDC y la voluntad de venganza de los militares y habitantes de esta.
					
					Puesto que EE.UU. desenvaino el sable para atropellar a toda costa a la RPDC, esta tambien lo hara para ajustar las cuentas finales y acabara con el imperialismo yanqui con sus poderosas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, centradas en las nucleares, medio todopoderoso.
					
					La realidad actual comprueba una vez mas cuan justa fue la opcion de la RPDC de aumentar en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo las fuerzas armadas nucleares bajo la bandera de la gran linea de impulso simultaneo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					EE.UU. sufrira el destino tragico de morirse quemado en el fuego prendido por si mismo.

articles.title: Coreanos rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en el dia del EPC
articles.content:
Coreanos rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en el dia del EPC
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 85o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los militares y civiles coreanos rinden homenaje a los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, el primero fundador y ambos constructores de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y simbolos de victoria eterna de la potencia Paektusan. 
					Al pie de las estatuas de bronce de los grandes Lideres en la capitalina colina Mansu, estaba colocado un cesto de flores enviado por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					Alli fueron depositados los cestos de flores a nombre de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, unidades del EPC y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, las instituciones, empresas y escuelas a todos niveles en esta capital y los ramos y ramitas de flores.
					
					Las ceremonias de homenaje tuvieron lugar tambien ante las estatuas de bronce e imagenes sonrientes levantadas en la Academia Militar General Kim Il Sung, la Academia Militar Politica Kim Il Sung, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el de Seguridad del Pueblo, la Casa de Creacion Mansudae y otros lugares de la capital y las unidades militares y las localidades del pais.

articles.title: ACNC critica en comentario el buen tratamiento a Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
ACNC critica en comentario el buen tratamiento a Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- La peor criminal Park Geun-hye, quien fue sentenciada por la nacion coreana, lleva una vida privilegiada en la carcel.
					La Prision de Seul amueblo la celda para ella, dos veces mas grande que los calabozos de delincuentes comunes, aceptando sus demandas.
					
					Tambien ofrecio a Park la habitacion de entrevista con su abogado particular, quien tiene el acceso libre a la carcel, y mantiene tapada hasta la lente de la camara de vigilancia.
					
					Este trato preferencial deja conocer que las autoridades titeres surcoreanas actuan todavia como brazos de Park, siendo un insulto insoportable a los manifestantes con velas que exigen ponerla a la horca.
					
					La justa lucha con velas, desatada por el inaudito escandalo de corrupcion, cumplio la obra de expulsar del poder a Park quien durante 4 anos de su mandato, se dedico a los actos antinacionales, antipopulares y antieticos.
					
					Por eso, la ex "presidenta" no puede recibir ningun trato cortes, excepto a la custodia y guardia para la seguridad personal.
					
					Lo insoslayable del caso es que las autoridades conservadoras, complices de Park, hablan ya sobre el indulto a ella.
					
					Informados de ese hecho, los habitantes surcoreanos condenan fuertemente a la traidora y las autoridades judiciales opinando que "Park Geun-hye no corrigio su habito de ponerse por encima de la ley" y "hay que hacerle pagar bien sus crimenes".
					
					No ha terminado todavia la sentencia de la historia y la opinion publica.
					
					La fiscalia surcoreana remitio oficialmente al tribunal el caso de Park Geun-hye bajo 18 sospechas, incluyendo el recibo de fondos de soborno y el abuso del poder.
					
					Pero, no incluyo cargos principales, inclusive el paradero de ella durante 7 horas inmediatas al hundimiento del ferry Sewol, el despliegue forzado de THAAD, la firma del "acuerdo" con Japon sobre el problema de esclavitud sexual establecida por el viejo ejercito japones y el cierre de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong.
					
					La realidad demuestra que la camarilla corrupta de Park trata de repetir la historia criminal.
					
					El pueblo exige el castigo mas terrible contra la traidora sin par y sus compinches conservadores.
					
					No se puede frenar por nada la voluntad de lucha de los habitantes surcoreanos por sentenciar duro a la banda traidora de Park, que desafia a la epoca y la opinion publica, y construir un nuevo mundo democratizado.

articles.title: ACNC condena a belicistas surcoreanos que toleran el "Plan de Jupiter" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC condena a belicistas surcoreanos que toleran el "Plan de Jupiter" de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos toleran la ejecucion del plan de guerra bioquimica de EE.UU. contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Recientemente, las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea anunciaron que emplazaron en su base en el Puerto de Pusan del Sur de Corea los equipos de experimento necesarios al cumplimiento del "Plan de Jupiter" para la guerra bioquimica anti-RPDC. 
					
					Provoca gran indignacion de toda la nacion coreana ese crimen antietico de EE.UU. que convirtio el suelo surcoreano en el campo de ensayo de guerra bioquimica e intenta imponer terribles desastres a la nacion coreana. 
					
					El "Plan de Jupiter" consiste en lanzar muchas bombas bioquimicas durante la futura guerra de agresion a la RPDC. 
					
					En el periodo de la pasada guerra coreana, los imperialistas norteamericanos usaron las armas bacteriologicas y quimicas prohibidas por la ley internacional y asesinaron indiscriminadamente a los inocentes civiles coreanos. 
					
					Desde finales de enero hasta finales de marzo de 1952, los agresores yanquis lanzaron en mas de 700 ocasiones las bombas bacteriologicas sobre mas de 400 puntos de la RPDC dejando como saldo mas de 50 mil muertos. 
					
					Sin embargo, los traidores surcoreanos se adhieren al diablo yanqui sin decirle ni una palabra de protesta.
					
					Como es conocido por todos, se usan mas de 15 tipos de sustancias bioquimicas como bacilos de peste y botulina para la ejecucion del "Plan de Jupiter". Y solo en el ano 2015, se introdujeron en 16 ocasiones los bacilos de antracosis en las bases militares norteamericanas en el Sur de Corea para los experimentos de armas biologicas.  
					
					Cuando ocurrio ese incidente, la camarilla de Park Geun-hye, horda de traidores a la nacion, defendio el crimen de su amo norteamericano diciendo que eso fue un "simple error" y "es dificil definirlo como violacion del Acuerdo Administrativo".
					
					Para colmo, estimulo la implementacion del "Plan de Jupiter" chismeando que "se trata de defensa legitima frente al ataque de antracosis del Norte". 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos, enloquecidos por el enfrentamiento fratricida, no pueden eludir la severa sentencia de la historia por su crimen de intentar exterminar a la nacion dejando el territorio patrio como campo de guerra nuclear y bioquimica de EE.UU. 
					
					Los habitantes de diferentes estratos del Sur de Corea y toda la nacion coreana no deben tolerar nunca a la banda conservadora proyanqui..
